snippet: Playing any part in one of modern aviation’s most enduring mysteries may not make the best tourism advertisement. But Réunion Island sees it differently.
abstract: Reunion Island, territory of France located off southeastern coast of Africa in Indian Ocean, celebrates fifth anniversary of its designation as Unesco World Heritage site; tourism industry is using Reunion's unfortunate link to washed-up debris from Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 to call attention to natural beauty of island, including white-sand beaches, lush  mountains and active volcanoes.
lead_paragraph: Playing any part in one of modern aviation’s most enduring mysteries may not make the best tourism advertisement. But Réunion Island sees it differently.

headline.print_headline: Linked to Missing Plane, Réunion Island Still Charms
headline.main: Réunion Island, Linked to Malaysian Plane, Makes Most of Moment

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
